mapper.update:
update decision_info
decision_id = #{decisionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
decision_name = #{decisionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
decision_group = #{decisionGroup,jdbcType=CHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
air_temp = #{airTemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
air_humidity = #{airHumidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
soil_moisture = #{soilMoisture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
co2 = #{co2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
n_content = #{nContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
p_content = #{pContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
k_content = #{kContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
soil_fertility = #{soilFertility,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ph = #{ph,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
illumination = #{illumination,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
red = #{red,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
blue = #{blue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
green = #{green,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yellow = #{yellow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
founder = #{founder,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`state` = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where decision_uuid = #{decisionUuid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update decision_info set decision_id = #{decisionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, decision_name = #{decisionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, decision_group = #{decisionGroup,jdbcType=CHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, air_temp = #{airTemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, air_humidity = #{airHumidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, soil_moisture = #{soilMoisture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, co2 = #{co2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_content = #{nContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_content = #{pContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, k_content = #{kContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, soil_fertility = #{soilFertility,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ph = #{ph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, illumination = #{illumination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, red = #{red,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blue = #{blue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, green = #{green,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yellow = #{yellow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, founder = #{founder,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where decision_uuid = #{decisionUuid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
